templates.name: Sync new Salesforce cases and comments with ServiceNow
templates.description: This template looks for new cases added in your Salesforce account and syncs this by creating a new ticket in ServiceNow that includes the comments from the original case.

templates.name: Open a ticket on ServiceNow from an identified issue in Slack and send an email using Gmail
templates.description: Use this template to open a ticket in ServiceNow directly from Slack using a simple slash command. The flow sends you an email using Gmail with the ticket ID number and creation date in the subject, and the description of the issue in the body of the email.

templates.name: Create a Slack translation bot
templates.description: Configure a /translate Slack slash command and use this template to translate messages from English to French, and French to English. Use /translate before a message for the bot to identify the language and translate the message. A message then appears in the channel in both languages, allowing for real-time multilingual chat.

templates.name: Create a case in Salesforce when a new incident is created in ServiceNow and alert team
templates.description: This template creates a new case in Salesforce when a new incident is created in ServiceNow. If this is an urgent incident, the flow then sends an email via Gmail and a message on Slack to alert the team when a highly urgent incident comes in to ServiceNow. This helps you to act quickly on your urgent support incidents!

templates.name: Sync Salesforce new cases with ServiceNow tickets
templates.description: The template creates a new ticket in ServiceNow when a new case is created in Salesforce - helping you to keep your support services in sync!

templates.name: Sync Marketo new leads with Salesforce Leads
templates.description: Never miss a lead again! This templates creates or updates a new lead in Salesforce when a new lead is created in Marketo.

templates.name: Send Gmail message for a new Salesforce Lead or a Slack message if email address is missing
templates.description: Use this template to send your new Salesforce leads an email. If there is no email ID included then send a Slack message to your team that someone needs to call the lead.

templates.name: Send Gmail message to new Salesforce lead
templates.description: This template creates and sends an email via Gmail when a new lead is created in Salesforce. If there is no email provided for the lead then we log an error about the missing email.

templates.name: Send Gmail message for new Slack message
templates.description: This template sends a new Gmail message whenever a new message is received in Slack.

templates.name: Create an Asana task from a Gmail message
templates.description: This template creates a new task in Asana whenever a new Gmail message is received.

templates.name: Post Slack message for new Gmail message
templates.description: This template creates a new message in Slack whenever a new Gmail message is received.

templates.name: Assign ServiceNow incidents on Slack based on the language
templates.description: This template uses Watson Language Translator to detect the language of new ServiceNow incidents, then send messages to the appropriate Slack channels based on the language.  It also sends a message to a separate Slack channel for the most urgent incidents.

templates.name: For large Salesforce opportunities send an email and create an Asana task
templates.description: This template creates and sends an email via Gmail, and creates an Asana task, when a new high value opportunity is created in Salesforce.

templates.name: Create new leads in Marketo by capturing lead names and details in Slack
templates.description: Capturing leads at an event is never an easy task - consolidating these after the event is even harder. This template allows you to record your leads via the Slack phone app. This then records the contact in a Google sheet (to audit the creation), and then creates the contact in Marketo. A response is then sent on Slack giving the newly created Marketo contact id.

templates.name: Send a Gmail message when urgent ServiceNow incidents come in
templates.description: This template sends an email via Gmail when a highly urgent incident comes in to ServiceNow. This helps you to act quickly on your urgent support incidents!

templates.name: Create a new Trello card for a new Salesforce campaign
templates.description: This template creates a new card in Trello when a new campaign is created in Salesforce - make sure you never forget to finish that campaign again!

templates.name: Create a new Trello card for a new Salesforce lead
templates.description: This template creates a new card in Trello when a new lead is created in Salesforce - make sure you never forget to follow up with that lead again!

templates.name: Create a new Trello card for a new Salesforce case
templates.description: This template creates a new card in Trello when a new case is created in Salesforce - make sure you never forget to follow up with that new case again!

templates.name: Create a Trello card for every new Insightly task
templates.description: This template creates a new card in Trello when a new task is created in Insightly.

templates.name: Send me a Slack notification for every new Insightly contact
templates.description: Use this template to send a Slack notification to your chosen channel whenever a new contact is added in Insightly.

templates.name: Send me a Slack notification for every new Marketo lead
templates.description: Use this template to send a Slack notification to your chosen channel whenever a new contact is added in Marketo.

templates.name: Add a card to a list in Trello when a new lead is added in Marketo
templates.description: This template creates a new card in Trello when a new lead is created in Marketo - make sure that you never forget to follow up with that lead again!

templates.name: Create an Asana task for every new Insigthly task
templates.description: Use this template to create task in Asana when a new task added in Insightly.

templates.name: Copy messages between Slack channels
templates.description: Use this template to copy messages between two Slack channels. This can be between channels in the same Slack account or between channels in different Slack accounts.

templates.name: Create a new contact in Acoustic Campaign when a new contact is added in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to create a new contact in Acoustic Campaign when a new contact is created in the Salesforce.

templates.name: Send me a Slack notification for every new Salesforce opportunity
templates.description: Use this template to send a Slack notification to the sales team when a new opportunity is added in Salesforce.

templates.name: Sync Salesforce Leads between accounts and check and record state
templates.description: This template schedules a monthly synchronisation (batch) between the Leads of two Salesforce accounts. When it completes, a Gmail message is sent with the results of the operation.  You can use this template to perform a check on the status of a batch process.

templates.name: API to create or update leads in Salesforce based on a Google Sheets spreadsheet
templates.description: This template creates an API to create or update leads in Salesforce for a specific event based on data collected in a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

templates.name: An API to create a contact in Salesforce using a name and email address
templates.description: This is the template for an API used to create a new contact in Salesforce.

templates.name: API to create leads in Salesforce using a csv file from Box
templates.description: This API takes a URL to a Box document, and an optional event name. Using that information it retrieves the document, parses it to find the new leads generated and creates or updates those leads in Salesforce.

templates.name: Download a PDF attachment from Salesforce and add the PDF document to the Watson Discovery Service
templates.description: Use this template to download an attachment from Salesforce and add the same document to the IBM Watson Discovery Service.

templates.name: Retrieve file content from Google Drive then add the document to the Watson Discovery Service
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve file content from Google Drive and add the same document to the IBM Watson Discovery Service.

templates.name: Using the For each node and JSONata to process high priority issues
templates.description: Use this template to receive a notification in the log for high priority issues.
templates.summary: Scheduler to Atlassian Jira Service Desk

templates.name: At regular intervals extract Salesforce lead details and upload Box file with CSV output
templates.description: This template gathers 10 leads from Salesforce, uses their names and email addresses to build a CSV file, then outputs the file to Box. The flow triggers once per day at 00:00 UTC.

templates.name: API to retrieve source code repository details and send an email about inactive repositories
templates.description: Use this template to find inactive source code repositories, then send an email to the repository owner so that they know which repositories to archive.

templates.name: Sync leads between Salesforce accounts and send email with the sync result
templates.description: Use this template to start a batch process using the scheduler node to retrieve leads from Salesforce Account 1 and then create or update leads in Salesforce Account 2. The flow will send a message to Slack to alert you when the batch process has started, and an email will be sent to your preferred email address with the status of the sync.

templates.name: Get PagerDuty schedule and update Slack user group and topic
templates.description: Use this template to manage members of a Slack group based on a PagerDuty schedule.

templates.name: Welcome guide part 3 - Create a CSV file in Box of the products in Salesforce
templates.description: This template contains the flow created in the 'Welcome to IBM App Connect [Part 3 of 4]: Visually map and transform your data' video. Use it to retrieve a list of products for a particular product family from Salesforce, and use the products to generate a CSV file in Box on a schedule.

templates.name: Welcome guide part 4 - Flower order API
templates.description: This template contains the API created in the 'Welcome to IBM App Connect [Part 4 of 4]: Create flows for an API' video. The API includes a flow to create a Trello card when new flowers are ordered for the festival, and it updates Salesforce with the quantity of flowers needed.

templates.name: Welcome guide setup 1 - Add products to Salesforce
templates.description: Use this flow in conjuction with the templates for 'Welcome guide part 3 - Create a CSV file in Box of the products in Salesforce' and 'Welcome guide part 4 - Flower order API' to set up Salesforce products.

templates.name: Welcome guide setup 2 - Create Sunflower Festival order in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to create the Salesforce order needed for the 'Welcome guide part 4 - Flower order API' template.

templates.name: Welcome guide setup 3 - Delete flowers and order from Salesforce
templates.description: This template contains a flow to delete the objects created in 'Welcome guide setup 1 - Add products to Salesforce' and 'Welcome guide setup 2 - Create Sunflower Festival order in Salesforce'.

templates.name: Open Banking - Account information data load
templates.description: This flow aggregates the account information of users with active consents set up in Yapily and stores it in IBM Cloudant

templates.name: Assign ServiceNow incidents to Jira and Slack
templates.description: This template detects when a new ServiceNow incident is created; if the incident has a High urgency creates an issue in Jira and sends a message to a Slack channel; otherwise, create a task in Jira. The flow illustrates the use of Jira create and retrieve actions, and the use of an If node to take alternative actions depending on data from the ServiceNow new incident trigger event.

templates.name: Weekly copy Dropbox files to new COS S3 bucket named with date
templates.description: This template copies files from a Dropbox folder to a new bucket in IBM Cloud Object Storage S3 on a weekly schedule.

templates.name: Orders ingestion to IBM Supply Chain Intelligence Suite from Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve multiple global identifiers of an order from Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM system and ingest these global identifiers as name-value pairs to the IBM Supply Chain Intelligence Suite.

templates.name: Send a Slack message for urgent ServiceNow incidents
templates.description: This template sends a message via Slack when a highly urgent incident comes in to ServiceNow. This helps you to act quickly on your urgent support incidents.

templates.name: Record Microsoft Dynamics 365 campaign to Google Sheets
templates.description: This template creates a new row in Google Sheets whenever a campaign is added in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Slack notifications for Closed Won opportunities in Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: This template allows you to receive Slack message with the opportunities details whenever opportunities are updated with 'Closed Won' status in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Record Jira issues to Google Sheets
templates.description: This template creates a new row in Google Sheets whenever a new issue is created in Jira.

templates.name: Create Box folders for Jira issues
templates.description: This template creates a Box folder with the Jira issue key whenever a new issue is created in Jira.

templates.name: Send a Microsoft Teams message when a case is created or updated in Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: This template allows you to receive a Microsoft Teams message with the case details when a case is created or updated in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Send a Microsoft Teams message when a new Insightly task is created
templates.description: This template allows you to receive Microsoft Teams message with the task details when a new Insightly task is created.

templates.name: Create a task in Asana when a new contact is created in Insightly
templates.description: This template creates a task in Asana with the contact details when a new contact is created in Insightly. A slack message is created to notify the Insightly contact is created in Asana.

templates.name: Retrieve MS Dynamics 365 leads and create an MS Excel CSV file in Dropbox at regular intervals
templates.description: This template retrieves 10 leads maximum at a time from Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales and creates a Microsoft Excel .csv file with the lead details in Dropbox. The flow is triggered once a day at 00:00 UTC.

templates.name: Creates an object in Amazon S3 when a new lead is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: This template creates the lead details in Amazon S3 when a new lead is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Creates an object in Amazon S3 when an attachment of type incident is created in ServiceNow
templates.description: This template creates the attachment details in Amazon S3  when an attachment of type incident is created in ServiceNow.

templates.name: Creates a Dropbox folder and shares the link via Slack when a new spreadsheet is created in Google Sheets
templates.description: This template creates a Dropbox folder when a new spread sheet is created in Google Sheets. A Dropbox share link is created for the folder and shared through a Slack message.

templates.name: Creates a file in Dropbox when a new email is received in Gmail
templates.description: This template creates a file with the email details in Dropbox when a new email is received in Gmail.

templates.name: Sync new contact from Insightly to Marketo
templates.description: This template finds a matching lead in Marketo based on the email address when a new contact is created Insightly. If a matching lead is not found, the lead is created in Marketo and a Slack notification is sent. If a matching lead is found, the lead is updated in Marketo and a Slack notification is sent.

templates.name: Creates a Trello card for a new Insightly lead
templates.description: This template adds the card to the list in Trello when a lead is created in Insightly.

templates.name: Sync Insightly new leads with Salesforce leads
templates.description: This template creates new leads in Salesforce when a new lead is created in Insightly.

templates.name: Sync Insightly contacts with Microsoft Dynamics 365 contacts
templates.description: This template creates a contact in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales when a new contact is created in Insightly.

templates.name: Creates a file in Box when a new incident is created in ServiceNow
templates.description: This template creates a new file in Box with the incident details when a new incident is created in ServiceNow.

templates.name: Send a Slack message when a high or highest priority issue is created in Jira
templates.description: This template creates a new Slack message with the issue details when a 'High' or 'Highest' priority issue is created in Jira.

templates.name: Creates an incident in ServiceNow when an issue is created in Jira
templates.description: This template creates a new incident in ServiceNow with the issue details when an issue is created in Jira.

templates.name: Creates a case in Salesforce when an issue is created in Jira
templates.description: This template creates new case in Salesforce with the issue details when an issue is created in Jira.

templates.name: Send a Slack message when an incident is created in ServiceNow
templates.description: This template creates a new Slack message when a new incident is created in ServiceNow.

templates.name: Send a Slack message when an incident is updated in ServiceNow
templates.description: This template creates a new Slack message when an incident is updated in ServiceNow.

templates.name: Creates a list item attachment in SharePoint and uploads it to Box when a new attachment is created in ServiceNow
templates.description: This template uploads an attachment file with its details to a specified Box folder from Microsoft SharePoint when new attachment is created in ServiceNow.

templates.name: Record ServiceNow ticket details to Google Sheets
templates.description: Use this template to create a new row in Google Sheets when a ticket is created in ServiceNow.

templates.name: Create new Trello card when a new case is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: Use this template to create a new Trello card when a new case is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Create new user in ServiceNow when a new contact is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: Use this template to create a new user in ServiceNow when a new contact is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Send a Microsoft Teams message when a new product is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: This template creates a new Microsoft Teams message when a new product is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Send a Slack message when a new order is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: This template creates a new Slack message whenever a new order is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Send a Slack message when accounts are created in Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: This template creates a new Slack message whenever a new account is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Send a Slack message when new contacts are created in Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: This template allows you to receive a Slack message with the contact details whenever new contacts are created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Send a Slack notification for resolved case in Microsoft Dynamics 365
templates.description: This template creates a Slack message to notify user when a case is marked as resolved in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Creates an Asana task when a new Microsoft Teams message is created
templates.description: This template creates a task in Asana if Microsoft Teams message contains the word 'task'.

templates.name: Sync new or updated contact from Microsoft Dynamics 365 to Marketo lead
templates.description: This template updates or creates a Marketo lead when a new contact is created or updated in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales based on the email address. If the email address of the Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales contact and Marketo lead is different, a new lead is created in Marketo. If the email address is the same, the lead is updated with the contact details in Marketo.

templates.name: Create a list item in SharePoint when a Wufoo form is submitted
templates.description: Use this template to create a list item in SharePoint when a completed form entry is submitted in Wufoo. A Microsoft Teams message is received with the list item details.

templates.name: Send a Microsoft Teams message when a listitem is updated in SharePoint
templates.description: This template allows you to receive Microsoft Teams message with details when the listitem is updated in SharePoint.

templates.name: Send a Slack message when a site is created or updated in SharePoint
templates.description: This template creates a new message in Slack whenever site is created or updated in SharePoint.

templates.name: Send a Microsoft Teams message when a sales order is created or updated in Salesforce
templates.description: This template creates a new Microsoft Teams message when a sales order is created or updated in Salesforce.

templates.name: Send a Slack message for every updated message in Microsoft Teams
templates.description: This template allows you to receive a Slack message with details whenever there is any updated message in Microsoft Teams.

templates.name: Send a Microsoft Teams message when an issue is created in Jira
templates.description: This template creates a new Microsoft Teams message with the Jira issue details when an issue is created in Jira.

templates.name: Send a Microsoft Teams message when a ticket is created in ServiceNow
templates.description: This template creates a Microsoft Teams message with the ServiceNow ticket details when a ticket is created in ServiceNow.

templates.name: Creates a Dropbox file when a new attachment is created in ServiceNow
templates.description: This template uploads the attachment file details to Dropbox when a new attachment is created in ServiceNow

templates.name: Sync new case from Microsoft Dynamics 365 to ServiceNow
templates.description: This template creates a new incident in ServiceNow when a new case is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Sync leads from Microsoft Dynamics 365 to Marketo
templates.description: This template finds a matching lead in Marketo based on the email address when a new lead is created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales. If a matching lead is not found, the lead is created in Marketo.

templates.name: Create a Trello card for new SharePoint listitem
templates.description: This template creates a new Trello card when new listitem is created in Microsoft SharePoint.

templates.name: Create a user in Microsoft AD for each contact in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve contacts from Salesforce, then for each create a user in Microsoft Active Directory, and then update the Saleforce contact.

templates.name: Create a new task in Asana when a new Salesforce campaign is created
templates.description: Use this template to create a new task in Asana for a new Salesforce campaign, setting the Asana task name to the name of the Salesforce campaign.

templates.name: Send a message on Slack when a new Salesforce contact is created
templates.description: Use this template to send a Slack message when a new contact created in Salesforce, with the message containing data from the Salesforce contact.

templates.name: Create a new Jira issue for a new Trello card
templates.description: When a new issue is created in Jira, a new Trello card is created with metadata from the Jira issue.

templates.name: Create a new Trello card when a new opportunity record is created in Salesforce
templates.description: Learn how easy it is to use App Connect to connect Salesforce to Trello so that every time a new opportunity is created in Salesforce, details of that opportunity are added automatically to a card list in the Trello account.

templates.name: Create a new Trello card when a new row is added in Google Sheets
templates.description: Learn how easy it is to use App Connect to connect Google Sheets to Trello so that every time a new row is added in Google Sheets, a new card is created in the Trello account with metadata of the new row from Google Sheets.

templates.name: Creates a task in Asana when an issue is created in Jira
templates.description: Whenever a new Issue is created in Jira, a new task is created in Asana

templates.name: Create data extension values in Salesforce Marketing Cloud for contacts created in Salesforce event
templates.description: Use this template to create a contact’s data extension values table with the contact’s details whenever a contact is created in a Salesforce New contact event.

templates.name: An email gets sent when a Salesforce opportunity update fails due to incorrect values
templates.description: Use this template to send an email when a Salesforce opportunity update fails due to incorrect values.

templates.name: Add a document in IBM Watson Discovery when a file is created in IBM OpenPages with Watson
templates.description: Use this template to add a document in IBM Watson Discovery whenever a file is created and downloaded in IBM OpenPages with Watson.

templates.name: Create a document in Couchbase whenever a ticket gets created in Zendesk Service
templates.description: Use this template to create a document in Couchbase with the specified document data whenever a ticket is created in Zendesk Service. A Slack message is then sent to the intended channel.

templates.name: Create a list of workers for an upcoming assignment in Google Sheets from Oracle HCM worker records
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve worker details from Oracle Human Capital Management and create an entry in Google Sheets whenever a worker’s status is inactive.

templates.name: Create a new IBM EWM work item when a new incident is logged in ServiceNow
templates.description: Use this template to create a work item in IBM Engineering Workflow Management whenever a new incident is logged in ServiceNow. A notification is then sent to the relevant squad through Microsoft Teams.

templates.name: Create a pickup ready order event through flexEngage based on the IBM Sterling Order Management System delivery method
templates.description: Use this template to create a pickup ready order event if the IBM Order Management System delivery method is empty. An email is then sent from flexEngage with the order pickup details.

templates.name: Create an incident or problem in ServiceNow when a ticket is created in Zendesk Service
templates.description: Use this template to create an incident or problem in ServiceNow when a ticket is created in Zendesk Service. A Slack notification gets sent to the relevant squad.

templates.name: Create an issue in IBM OpenPages with Watson when an incident is created in ServiceNow
templates.description: Use this template to create an issue in IBM OpenPages with Watson whenever an incident gets created in ServiceNow. This flow helps you to keep incident data in sync between ServiceNow and IBM OpenPages with Watson.

templates.name: Create an item on the mondaydotcom board for tickets created in Zendesk Service
templates.description: Use this template to create an item on the monday.com board for tickets created in Zendesk Service.

templates.name: Create new contact in Acoustic Campaign when a new contact is added in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to create a new contact in Acoustic Campaign when a new contact is created in the Salesforce.

templates.name: Create order in IBM Sterling Order Management System for orders created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales
templates.description: Use this template to create orders by using the IBM Order Management System’s create order asynchronous operation whenever any new orders are created in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Create a single invoice in Oracle E-Business Suite when an order is closed
templates.description: Use this template to create a single invoice in Oracle E-Business Suite when an order status is updated to closed in Oracle E-Business Suite. An email is sent from Gmail with the invoice details.

templates.name: Creates data extension values in Salesforce Marketing Cloud for contacts created in Salesforce event
templates.description: Use this template to create contact’s data extension values table with the contact’s details whenever a contact is created in a Salesforce New contact event.

templates.name: Invoke a function from AWS Lambda whenever an opportunity gets created in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to invoke a function from AWS Lambda whenever an opportunity gets created in Salesforce.

templates.name: Launch an Amazon EC2 instance whenever a new row is appended in Google Sheets requesting to launch the instance
templates.description: Use this template to launch an Amazon EC2 instance whenever a new row is appended in the Google Sheets worksheet.

templates.name: Retrieve a file from Box and update the content in Anaplan, then import the data into a model in Anaplan
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve a file from Box and update the content in Anaplan, then import the data into a model in Anaplan.

templates.name: Retrieve and update Microsoft Excel Online worksheet rows with the status email sent through Gmail
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve and update Microsoft Excel Online rows with the status email sent through a Gmail account.

templates.name: Stop or start or reboot the Amazon EC2 instance whenever a Zendesk Service ticket gets created
templates.description: Use this template to stop, start, or reboot the Amazon EC2 instance whenever a Zendesk Service ticket gets created.

templates.name: Sync employee records between Couchbase and Amazon DynamoDB
Syncs Microsoft Active Directory computers to Microsoft Azure Active Directory
Syncs Microsoft Active Directory users to Microsoft Azure Active Directory
templates.description: Use this template to create or update the user in Microsoft Azure Active Directory whenever a new user is created or updated in Microsoft Active Directory, helping you keep your user information in sync.

templates.name: Syncs Salesforce accounts with Oracle E-Business Suite customers
templates.description: Use this template to create a customer in Oracle E-Business Suite whenever an account is created in Salesforce.

templates.name: Update ServiceNow incident and send a Microsoft Teams notification whenever a work item in IBM EWM is updated
templates.description: Use this template to update the incident in ServiceNow when any updates are done to the existing work item in IBM Engineering Workflow Management. A Microsoft Teams notification is then sent to the relevant squad.

templates.name: Initiate a large volume read request for an Anaplan view and share the data as an attachment via Gmail
templates.description: Use this template to request a large volume of data insights from a view in Anaplan, download it, and share the data as an attachment via Gmail.

templates.name: Create a lead in Salesforce whenever a new row that contains potential lead data is appended in Microsoft Excel Online
templates.description: Use this template to add a new lead in Salesforce whenever a new row is appended in Microsoft Excel Online with potential lead data. A Slack message gets sent to the intended channel.

templates.name: Trigger an alarm whenever the threshold is violated based on the Amazon CloudWatch published metric data
templates.description: Use this template to trigger an alarm whenever the published metric data breaches the threshold value set in Amazon CloudWatch. An email gets sent to the intended recipient by AWS Simple Notification Service (SNS) for each threshold violation.

templates.name: Create a repository or issue in GitHub when a new issue is created in Jira
templates.description: Use this template to create a repository or an issue in GitHub whenever an issue is created in Jira, based on the issue type. A GitHub repository is created when a new Jira issue of type Epic is created in the specified Jira project. Otherwise, if a Jira issue is created with any other issue type in the specified Jira project, a GitHub issue is created.

templates.name: Trigger a Jenkins build for a new commit on GitHub
templates.description: Use this template to trigger a Jenkins build whenever a new commit is made in GitHub. A Slack message is then sent to the intended channel.

templates.name: Insert data into the Snowflake table when a new file gets created in Amazon S3
templates.description: Use this template to add data to a Snowflake table whenever a new file gets created in the Amazon S3 bucket.

templates.name: Create a platform event in Salesforce whenever a product is created or updated in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales
templates.description: Use this template to create a platform event whenever a product is created or updated in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales.

templates.name: Send a Gmail message when a platform event is triggered
templates.description: Use this template to send a Gmail message to the subscribers of the platform event.

templates.name: Create lead in Insightly and store the details in Amazon DynamoDB whenever a new lead is created in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to create a lead with the lead’s details in Insightly, and store the information of the lead in Amazon DynamoDB whenever a new lead is created in Salesforce.

templates.name: Update lead in Insightly and store the updated details in Amazon DynamoDB whenever a lead is updated in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to update a lead or its details in Insightly, and store the updated information in Amazon DynamoDB whenever a new lead is created in Salesforce.

templates.name: Retrieve campaign-related records from Salesforce and update the rows in Microsoft Excel Online with campaign details
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve campaigns and their members' records from Salesforce and update the rows in the Microsoft Excel Online worksheet with the campaign details. Campaign-related information is queried from Salesforce for a specified year, and these details are then appended to a Microsoft Excel Online worksheet with the specified campaign information.

templates.name: Create a supplier and invoice in Coupa for each purchase order retrieved from IBM Maximo
templates.description: Use this template to create a supplier and invoice in Coupa for each purchase order retrieved from IBM Maximo. A Slack message is then sent to the intended channel with the supplier and invoice details.

templates.name: Amazon EventBridge sends events when a Salesforce lead is successfully created or when a Salesforce lead creation fails
templates.description: Use this template to create a lead in Salesforce when a new row is appended to the Microsoft Excel Online worksheet. Upon each successful lead creation in Salesforce, Amazon EventBridge sends events to the specified event bus. A Slack notification then confirms that the event has been published.

templates.name: Create a file in Microsoft OneDrive for Business and a Zendesk ticket whenever a Gmail message is received
templates.description: Use this template to create a file in Microsoft OneDrive for Business, and a ticket in Zendesk whenever an email is received from a Gmail account.

templates.name: Upload the attachments to Microsoft OneDrive for Business whenever a new issue with attachments is created in Jira
templates.description: Use this template to create a file with the attachment content in Microsoft OneDrive for Business when a new issue with attachments gets created in Jira.

templates.name: Create an order in Oracle E-Business Suite when a new opportunity is created in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to create a new order whenever a new opportunity is created in Salesforce and a Slack notification is sent to the dedicated channel.

templates.name: Add records to Amazon Kinesis data streams for each object retrieved from Amazon S3
templates.description: Use this template to add records to Amazon Kinesis data streams for each object retrieved from Amazon S3. Make sure that you run the Get Amazon Kinesis data stream record flow before running this flow.

templates.name: Integrate data between Microsoft Azure Blob storage and Amazon Kinesis
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve a blob file from a specified Azure blob container, split the content into a user-defined file size, download the file content, and add the spilt records to an Amazon S3 bucket through Amazon Kinesis delivery streams.

templates.name: Filter records with speed limit violations and add these records to Amazon S3 via the Amazon Kinesis delivery stream
templates.description: Use this template to add the vehicle records with speed limit violation in Amazon Kinesis. The Amazon CloudWatch event logs are seamlessly retrieved and published to an Amazon Kinesis data stream. The data is processed, and the filtered data (which violates the speed limit) is added to the Amazon S3 bucket via Amazon Kinesis delivery streams.

templates.name: Get Amazon Kinesis data stream records
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve data stream records. This flow acts as a consumer for the use case: Add records to Amazon Kinesis data streams for each object retrieved from Amazon S3.

templates.name: Create a supplier in Coupa for each supplier profile downloaded from SAP Ariba
templates.description: Use this template to download the supplier profiles from SAP Ariba and create these suppliers in Coupa for each of the supplier profiles that were downloaded from SAP Ariba with the relevant supplier information.

templates.name: Create a sourcing project in SAP Ariba for each project retrieved from Insightly
templates.description: Use this template to create a sourcing project in SAP Ariba for each project retrieved from Insightly.

templates.name: Create a Google Calendar event whenever an epic is created in GitLab
templates.description: Use this template to create an event in Google Calendar whenever an epic is created in Gitlab. In this example, the GitLab epic details are parsed to Google Calendar, and an invite gets sent to the intended attendees with the epic details.

templates.name: Export the report from Microsoft Power BI and create the file in Microsoft OneDrive for Business
templates.description: Use this template to export a report from Microsoft Power BI and create the file in Microsoft OneDrive for Business. If the report already exists, it will be updated in Microsoft OneDrive for Business.

templates.name: Retrieve leads from Insightly and add the lead data to Microsoft Power BI
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve lead records from Insightly, and the lead data is added to Microsoft Power BI. In this example, the lead data is inserted into a Microsoft Power BI dataset. This data helps analyse and visualise the data patterns in reports.

templates.name: Send a Gmail message when the Microsoft Power BI target goal value is either achieved or failed
templates.description: Use this template to send a Gmail message to the intended recipient if the retrieved Microsoft Power BI goal value set is not achieved. A Gmail message will also be sent if the goal value is achieved.

templates.name: Create an order in Salesforce whenever a new customer order is created in Magento
templates.description: Use this template to update the order details in an enterprise resource planning (ERP) system, for example, Salesforce and send the order confirmation number by Gmail whenever a new customer order is created in Magento.

templates.name: Retrieve orders from Salesforce and notify customers about any weather dependent delays
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve an order from Salesforce, map the shipping address to IBM Weather Company Data to retrieve the forecast, and send a delayed order notification to the customer via Domino. This use case helps you inform your customers when the delivery of an order is going to be delayed due to bad weather conditions.

templates.name: Retrieve emails by subject from Microsoft Exchange and upload the details to the Wufoo
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve emails from Microsoft Exchange based on the subject by searching for a specified keyword.

templates.name: Synchronize data between Amazon DynamoDB and Google Big Query
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve employee records from Amazon DynamoDB and synchronise that data with Google Cloud BigQuery.

templates.name: IBM Sterling Inventory Visibility performs a supply check for each product that it retrieves
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve a list of products from IBM Sterling Inventory Visibility and create a message in a Microsoft Team channel based on the status of the retrieved item and where it is in the delivery process.

templates.name: Create an issue in GitLab whenever a new incident is logged in ServiceNow
templates.description: Use this template to create a new issue in GitLab whenever a new incident is logged in ServiceNow and the incident is updated in ServiceNow with GitLab detail.

templates.name: Data integration between Microsoft Azure Blob storage and Amazon S3
templates.description: Use this template to create a scheduler-based flow that retrieves a large blob file’s metadata from a specified Azure blob container, splits the file into a user-defined file size, downloads the file content, and uploads the spilt files to an Amazon S3 bucket or any other storage endpoint.

templates.name: Retrieve incidents from ServiceNow based on the severity level and push incident details to a Microsoft Teams channel
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve incidents from ServiceNow and send those incidents, along with incident details, to a channel in Microsoft Teams.

templates.name: Retrieve documents from IBM Cloudant and publish them in Google Cloud PubSub topics
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve the flight times from an IBM Cloudant database and publish them into Google Cloud PubSub topics.

templates.name: Data ingestion to Google Cloud Storage from Dropbox
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve any type of file from the specified Dropbox path, downloads the content, and uploads the metadata and the file to a Google Cloud Storage bucket.

templates.name: Retrieve the last build from Jenkins and if the build fails create an issue in Jira if an issue does not already exist
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve the last build details from Jenkins. If the build fails, an issue is created in Jira if an issue doesn’t already exist.

templates.name: Update or create a configuration string in Redis
templates.description: Use this template to update or create a string in Redis and then display the response payload from Redis in a Slack channel as confirmation.

templates.name: Retrieve a configuration string from Redis
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve an existing string in Redis and then display the response payload from Redis in a Slack channel as confirmation. This is a sequal use case of 'Update or create a configuration string in Redis'.

templates.name: Retrieve documents from IBM Cloudant and insert document data into a Google Cloud BigQuery table
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve documents from an IBM Cloudant database and inserts data from these documents into a Google Cloud BigQuery table.

templates.name: Retrieve employees from Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations and create users in Microsoft Active Directory
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve employees from Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations and create a new user in Microsoft Active Directory (MSAD).

templates.name: Retrieve documents from Microsoft SharePoint and upload them to an IBM FileNet repository
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve documents from Microsoft SharePoint and upload those documents to an IBM FileNet repository.

templates.name: Add a Mailchimp subscriber from a Slack slash command
templates.description: Use this template to add a new member as a subscriber of a Mailchimp list from a Slack slash command.

templates.name: Add Eventbrite attendees to Insightly and MailChimp
templates.description: This template creates an Insightly lead when someone registers for an event in Eventbrite and additionally subscribes the attendee to a MailChimp campaign list.

templates.name: Add Eventbrite event as a new Salesforce campaign and notify via Slack
templates.description: When a new event is created in Eventbrite, this flow tries to retrieve a matching campaign in Salesforce. If a matching campaign is not found in Salesforce, the flow creates a new campaign in Salesforce and adds a message to a Slack channel.

templates.name: Add new Eventbrite attendees to MailChimp lists
templates.description: This template adds attendees of Eventbrite events to different mailing lists in MailChimp, depending on the event that they sign up to.

templates.name: Announce new Eventbrite attendees on Slack
templates.description: Use this template to send a Slack message when new attendees register for an Eventbrite event.

templates.name: Announce new Eventbrite attendees on Slack and send a voucher
templates.description: Use this template to send a free drink voucher to attendees of Eventbrite event.

templates.name: Create a new contact in Salesforce for a new Eventbrite order
templates.description: When a new order for an event is created in Eventbrite, this flow tries to retrieve a matching contact in Salesforce by email address. If a matching contact is not found in Salesforce, the flow creates a new contact in Salesforce.

templates.name: Create targeted contact lists in Eventbrite based on unconverted Salesforce leads and geography
templates.description: This template triggers on a new Eventbrite event. It retrieves new unconverted leads from Salesforce and checks to see if their city features in the event.  If it does, they they are added to a newly created Eventbrite contact list which can be reviewed by the organisers, who are notified about this list creation in Slack.

templates.name: Create a new Trello card when a new event in Eventbrite is added
templates.description: This template creates a new card in Trello when a new event is added in Eventbrite. You can use this template to track tasks such as checking attendee lists prior to the event.

templates.name: Create a Sharepoint team site for the new Eventbrite event
templates.description: This template detects when a new Eventbrite event is created and then automatically creates a site in Microsoft Sharepoint online, adds a list to the site, and then posts a message in Slack.

templates.name: Record Eventbrite attendees to Google Sheets
templates.description: Use this template to record each newly-registered attendee of an Eventbrite event as a new row in Google Sheets.

templates.name: Send a Microsoft Teams message when a new event is created in Eventbrite
templates.description: This template allows you to receive a Microsoft Teams message with the event details when a new event is created in Eventbrite.

templates.name: Send a Gmail message when a new event is added to Eventbrite
templates.description: This template creates and sends an email via Gmail when a new event is added in Eventbrite. You can use this template to boost sign ups to your events.

templates.name: Sync new attendee from Eventbrite to lead in Insightly
templates.description: This template creates a new lead in Insightly when a new attendee is created in Eventbrite.

templates.name: Sync new attendee from Eventbrite to lead in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales
templates.description: This template creates a new lead in Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales whenever a new attendee is created in Eventbrite.

templates.name: Sync Salesforce contacts and Mailchimp mailing list subscribers
templates.description: This template adds new Salesforce contacts to Mailchimp lists and sends an email via Gmail to alert you if a contact's email address is missing.

templates.name: Update Eventbrite event based on IBM Weather forecast
templates.description: An API to get the weather forecast for an Eventbrite event and take different actions based on weather criteria.

templates.name: Update or create a Salesforce contact for a new Eventbrite event attendee
templates.description: This template updates or creates a Salesforce contact when a new attendee signs up for an Eventbrite event, depending on whether the Salesforce contact exists. It then posts a message to a Slack channel, depending on whether the contact was created or updated.

templates.name: Use Slack to notify of unprocessed UKG leave requests
templates.description: Use this template to send a Slack notification about unprocessed UKG leave requests.

templates.name: Create an employee account in LDAP for each employee retrieved from Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations
templates.description: Use this template to retrieve new employees from Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations, create accounts for each employee in LDAP, and update Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations with the employee email address.

templates.name: Update a Workday opportunity and send a Slack message whenever an opportunity is updated in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to update an opportunity in Workday when any updates are made to the existing opportunity in Salesforce. A Slack message gets sent to the relevant channel.

templates.name: Translate non-English content to English whenever a new Gmail message is received
templates.description: Use this template to translate the non-English content of a Gmail message to English whenever a new Gmail message is received.

templates.name: Translate Amazon S3 file content to a specified language and store the translated file in Amazon S3
templates.description: Use this template to translate Amazon S3 file content to a specified language and store the translated file in Amazon S3.

templates.name: Stop or start or reboot the Amazon RDS instance whenever a Zendesk Service ticket gets created
templates.description: Use this template to stop, start, or reboot the Amazon RDS instance whenever a Zendesk Service ticket gets created.

templates.name: Create a database instance in Amazon RDS when a new company is created in IBM Maximo
templates.description: Use this template to create a database instance in Amazon RDS when a new company is created in IBM Maximo.

templates.name: Store the lead details in Oracle Database when a new Salesforce lead gets created
templates.description: Use this template to store the lead details in Oracle Database when a new Salesforce lead gets created.

templates.name: Create a job requisition in SAP SuccessFactors and send an email to the hiring manager about the job requisition
templates.description: Use this template to send a gmail message when a new job requisition is created.

templates.name: Send an email using a template from Amazon SES whenever a lead is created in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to send an email using the template from Amazon SES if the lead's Salesforce status is open and they have not been contacted.

templates.name: Create a contact in Amazon SES whenever a new contact is created in Insightly
templates.description: Use this template to create a contact in Amazon SES whenever a new contact is created in Insightly.

templates.name: Notify users via phone call or text or WhatsApp message using Twilio whenever an incident is created in ServiceNow
templates.description: Use this template to notify users via phone call, text message, or WhatsApp message by using Twilio whenever an incident is created in ServiceNow.

templates.name: Create a note in Salesforce for the retrieved call details of a phone number from Twilio
templates.description: Use this template to create a note that contains the call details of a phone number from Twilio that is associated with a Salesforce account.

templates.name: Create a prospect in Salesforce Account Engagement whenever a new form entry is created in Wufoo
templates.description: Use this template to create a prospect in Salesforce Account Engagement with the prospect's information whenever a new form entry with a campaign attendee's information is created.

templates.name: Assign a prospect in Salesforce Account Engagement for each Salesforce Account Engagement visitor
templates.description: Use this template to assign a visitor to a prospect for each of the retrieved Salesforce Account Engagement visitors.

templates.name: Store the issue data in IBM Db2 whenever a new issue gets created in Jira
templates.description: Use this template to store the issue data in IBM Db2 whenever a new issue gets created in Jira.

templates.name: Create an incident in ServiceNow whenever a new customer issue record is added to IBM Db2
templates.description: Use this template to create an incident in ServiceNow whenever a new customer issue record is added to IBM Db2.

templates.name: Create a folder in Box whenever a new case is created in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to create a folder in Box whenever a new case is created in Salesforce.

templates.name: Create a folder in Box whenever a new opportunity is created in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to create a folder in Box whenever a new opportunity is created in Salesforce.

templates.name: Create a folder in Box whenever a new account is created in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to create a folder in Box whenever a new account is created in Salesforce.

templates.name: Create a folder in Box whenever a new incident is created in ServiceNow
templates.description: Use this template to create a folder in Box whenever a new incident is created in ServiceNow.

templates.name: Create a folder in Box for each event retrieved from Eventbrite
templates.description: Use this template to create a folder in Box for each event retrieved from Eventbrite.

templates.name: Create a folder in Box whenever a new form entry is created in Wufoo
templates.description: Use this template to create a folder in Box whenever a new form entry is created in Wufoo.

templates.name: Create a folder in Box whenever a new campaign is created in MailChimp
templates.description: Use this template to create a folder in Box whenever a new campaign is created in MailChimp.

templates.name: Create a folder in Google Drive for each event retrieved from Eventbrite
templates.description: Use this template to create a folder in Google Drive for each event retrieved from Eventbrite.

templates.name: Create a folder in Google Drive whenever a new row is appended in Google Sheets
templates.description: Use this template to create a folder in Google Drive whenever a new row is appended in a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

templates.name: Create a folder in Google Drive whenever a new campaign is created in Salesforce
templates.description: Use this template to create a folder in Google Drive whenever a new campaign is created in Salesforce.

templates.name: Send a Slack message whenever a new task is created in Asana
templates.description: Use this template to send a Slack message to the intended channel whenever a new task is created in Asana.

templates.name: Create a task in Asana whenever a new row is appended in Google Sheets
templates.description: Use this template to create a task in Asana whenever a new row is appended to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. A Slack notification is then posted in the intended channel.

templates.name: Create a row in Google Sheets whenever a new task is created in Asana
templates.description: Use this template to create a row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet whenever a new task is created in Asana. A Slack notification is then posted in the intended channel.

templates.name: Create a task in Asana whenever a new subscriber is added to MailChimp
templates.description: Use this template to create a task in Asana whenever a new subscriber is added in MailChimp.

templates.name: Send a Gmail message whenever a new task is created in Asana
templates.description: Use this template to send a Gmail message to the intended recipients whenever a new task is created in Asana.

templates.name: Add a card to a list in Trello whenever a new task is created in Asana
templates.description: Use this template to add a card to a list in Trello whenever a new task is created in Asana.

templates.name: Create a task in Asana whenever a new response is added in SurveyMonkey
templates.description: Use this template to create a task in Asana whenever a new response is added in SurveyMonkey.
